title: Learning Design Based on the RECE Model for Character Education of Pre-Service Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding foundational mathematics education theories and basic concepts of character education
context.additional_context: A process where pre-service teachers experience ethical dilemmas and social responsibility issues in real classroom settings via simulation/VR, fostering collaborative problem-solving skills through the RECE model.

learning_goals: Learners can systematically analyze character education-related issues by applying the four stages of the RECE model (Reflection-Engagement-Collaboration-Elaboration).
Learners can present critical thinking and creative solutions to real-world issues like religious diversity and social equity in VR simulation environments.
Learners can design alternative approaches to conflict situations in educational settings through collaborative discussions with peers.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
